website_summaries.verdict: A well-made pool brush that is angled to help keep the brush against your pool wall for quick and effective cleaning.
pros: Features a durable build with strong plastic and aluminum that stands up to tough cleaning tasks
Curved brush head is 18 inches long
Nylon bristles are firm enough to provide reliable scrubbing action
cons: This model is a few dollars more than similar pool brushes, but the price is in line with the quality

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: You're lucky if you get 2 years out of one of these pool brushes down here in Florida. So, I've been through many of these. Eventually the chlorine and the UV weaken the bristles and they break. Then you have a brush with no bristles. This one fits the extension pole well. It attaches securely. The head shape is such that you can brush the walls, the bottom, and the stairs very efficiently. It does a great job. The pool looked nice and clean, but when I brushed the floor, I couldn't believe the amount of dirt this thing discovered. I brushed it into a pile which made it easier for the pool vac to vacuum up.
customer_reviews.author: Tell It Like It Is

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to how it attaches to handle
customer_reviews.text: This is a great brush except the way it attaches to a handle is opposite from most so I had to buy a different handle than what I already had. In prepping our pool for this year it has worked great for scrubbing off last years funk that we missed. Very sturdy metal and the bristles are nice n stiff. Well worth having to get the new handle❤️
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, but NOT compatible with telescoping pole (and net set) from same company
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically because I bought a net & telescoping pole from the same company and assumed they’d be compatible. My mistake & my fault for assuming. This most definitely does not work with the telescoping pole so I’m now the proud owner of a brush with no pole, hooray! It is pretty sturdy and heavy duty feeling. I’d have been happy with the purchase if I had a pole to use it with!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn B.

customer_reviews.title: doesn't come with handle!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a lot of pool brushes and decided on this one because they showed it with a handle, my old handle was no good anymore. A lot of the brushes said right in the description that they came with No handle. This one didn't.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce H

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed
customer_reviews.text: Florida sun and chlorine is brutal on pool equipment and I don’t expect this new one to last more than a couple of years, about as long as the old one lasted. The new one is well constructed and when the time come I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: E. E. Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Ripped the pool liner
customer_reviews.text: The brush itself worked well on the floor of the pool, but sadly when used close to the edge of our inground vinyl lined pool, the edge of the brush, which is sharper than need be, sliced a hole clear through the liner. This would be great for a pool that does not have a vinyl liner, but no so much for a vinyl one.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied User

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy attachment. The clips are plastic and will snap easily. The brush itself may have otherwise rated better. By the reviews on similar brushes they all seem to have the same problem
customer_reviews.author: Surfinloui

customer_reviews.title: Works good/made good
customer_reviews.text: Use it on my vinyl liner unground pool. Feels substantial & will last.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Satisfying.
customer_reviews.text: I use this server all times a week for my 15 foot soft sided inter pool. It’s soft bristles don’t hurt the liner and they’re sturdy enough to cause satisfying algae cloud while cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi L. Kamp

customer_reviews.title: Good brush for the money
customer_reviews.text: Works well so far. Seems to be well made. I will know more after a few weeks in the sun. Good value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: RE-View

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money but not the best
customer_reviews.text: Its a good value for the price but there are better ones out there if you are willing to pay a bit more
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great Pool Brush
customer_reviews.text: This brush fitted onto the pole with no problem. It is sturdy and does the job. Seems to brush smoothly. Great brush. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: None

customer_reviews.title: Great brush
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for cleaning the bottom of the pool. Perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle  Nass

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Easy to screw my whale flap to this one.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Good brush.
customer_reviews.text: Good brush. Bristles are not too rigid, but strong enough to clean the pool.
customer_reviews.author: D. Carter

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: Bought six months ago and no problems. Was expecting it to crack and break by now, but it is holding up fine. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace old one that lasted 3 years, but I hung it on fence in Arizona sun. Should last longer since now I store it out of sun.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one use.
customer_reviews.text: The product cracked after one use as seen in the picture. I had to leave town and was not able to facilitate the return in time. Obviously I am not pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn p.

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done. Does not include the pole, which is inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Taurence

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good price.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it less than a week but so far so good. Worked great to help clean up an algae issue we were experiencing.
customer_reviews.author: Harpo

customer_reviews.title: Good brush but does not fit Intex Pole
customer_reviews.text: Brush is fine however it DOES NOT fit Intex telescoping pole. It is too big. The quality of the brush however is fine. This is why I am not leaving a bad review.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Roman

customer_reviews.title: May be priced right but no good
customer_reviews.text: Drags when pulling up to clean in my pool. Bristles to short
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, only had for couple weeks. Like the way it cleans pool
customer_reviews.author: Tim Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: Not as thick of bristle width rows as other brands I’ve bought in the past but works okay. For the price, it is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: James B.

customer_reviews.title: Comes up short
customer_reviews.text: No bristles at ends of brush. Not good for corners.
customer_reviews.author: Shotsfired

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Found exactly what I was looking for to clean my pool walls - nice bristles, perfect firmness.
customer_reviews.author: Kellynn Bruns

customer_reviews.title: Good pool/ pond brush
customer_reviews.text: Perfect pool brush. Just like the one I have had for many years and fitted the original telescopic pole perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Tennia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pool brush. I do swimming pool maintenance in Tenerife and bought this as it said heavy duty which it is. On my next trip to the U.K. I will be buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Lucille Loss

product_meta.title: Homga Swimming Pool Brush, 18" Pool Brush,Nylon Algae Pool Brush Designed for Cleans Walls, Tiles & Floors Effortlessly
product_meta.description:
Pool Brush, Homga 18" Swimming Pool Brush, Nylon Algae Pool Brush Designed for Cleans Walls, Tiles & Floors Effortlessly

Features:
1.18" Pool Brush Cleans Walls, Tiles, Floors, Steps Effortlessly! Picture perfect results in a matter of minutes!
2.Extra-wide nylon algae brush keep them safe and sanitary all season.
3. This swimming pool cleaning brush suitable for daily cleaning, designed to clean walls; floors; steps and corners, it is compatible with most standard pool poles

Specification:
Product Weight: 280g
Product Size: 45*5*12cm
Product Material: Aluminum alloy + ABS plastic + nylon

About Homga
We promise to offer good quality products to make you satisfied. We make every effort to provide quality services.
Please contact our customer service if there's any problem. 100% satisfaction or contact us to get your money back.
We will do whatever it takes to make sure you are happy!
feature_bullets: Save Time：18" Large nylon pool brush , fortified, blue frame . Curved to better reach corners, tight spaces and steps of the pool，help you complete cleaning the pool quickly.
Durable：This pool cleaning brush is made of high quality aluminum and ABS plastic for maximum strength and durability, and high-density nylon plastic brush, not damage the pool.
Easy To Use: ABS plastic handle is angled at 45° to present the brush in an ideal position for easy pushing and effective cleaning. Curved edges allow for brushing along corners.

Suitable For Daily Cleaning: This swimming pool cleaning brush suitable for daily cleaning, designed to clean walls; floors; steps and corners, it is compatible with most standard pool poles (pole not included).
Satisfaction Guarantee: We offer a 12 month Warranty and 100% Money Back or Free Exchange Guarantee.Please feel free to contact us if you have any puzzle.
